name: Tiny Planet (Game jam entry)
description:
Tiny planet is made in a Game jam of 48 hour. The theme was "Tiny World". 

In Tiny Planet you are the ruler of a planet of villagers. Set your villagers out to get resources like wood and stone and slowly build more things on your planet for your villagers. Build more residents and more villagers will join your planet to help you out!

This game is made in 48 hours and isn't as complete as I would like it to be. 

Known bug: Your villagers shoot into orbit and circle around your planet
